document.full_text: yemeni protesters demanding president ali abdullah saleh's immediate resignation vowed to step up street protests and voiced suspicions that saleh's inner circle could frustrate a gulf plan for him to step down.
document.title: protesters vow escalation as saleh promises to quit
lines_and_colors: yemeni protesters demanding president ali abdullah saleh's immediate resignation vowed to step up street protests and voiced suspicions that saleh's inner circle could frustrate a gulf plan for him to step down.
